Class Select

ca.uqac.lif.cep.Processor

ca.uqac.lif.cep.tuples.Select
All Implemented Interfaces:
ca.uqac.lif.cep.Contextualizable, ca.uqac.lif.cep.Duplicable, ca.uqac.lif.cep.DuplicableProcessor, ca.uqac.lif.cep.Stateful
public class Select extends ca.uqac.lif.cep.functions.ApplyFunction
Creates a Tuple from an AttributeGroup. This performs roughly the same function as the SELECT clause in an SQL statement.
Author:
Sylvain Hallé
